pages.title: Seasons
pages.text: The four standard seasons are present, each bringing their own changes to the in-game world. You may notice that oceans are much easier to cross in winter, for example.$(br2)Requiem is also much darker than vanilla minecraft, depending on the moon phase a night can become pitch black.

The underground is always pitch black, reguardless of the moon phase.$(br2)A torch will be needed to see anything at all during these blackouts, torches will continue to function while held.$(br2)Ores very rarely form outside of caves, meaning you'll need to go spelunking to progress.
